alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 2:21PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Custer County Plains and the Pennington County Plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
